steps: Two-step verification popup: Click Not Now

phase_2_verification.notes: Account shows in review - need to add billing
steps: If automatic payment doesnt show = weak proxy or suspicious email
Enter email code again if requested
Select campaign type: Traffic (or Reach, Video Views)
ad_group: UNSELECT other placements (Pangle etc) - TikTok only
Schedule: +1 day ahead (so it doesnt turn on)
ad_creative: Search for random product image (tree shirt etc)
Take screenshot / use image from folder
Add audio: click anything random from library

important_notes.emails: Gmails best. iCloud/Outlook/Hotmail secondary. Temp emails = payment failures
important_notes.proxy: Weak proxy or suspicious email = no automatic payment option
important_notes.eu_countries: Netherlands performs well for getting active and dealing with suspensions
important_notes.placements: ALWAYS unselect Pangle and other placements - TikTok only
